entries.description: Working with Reposit Power I have got to show my strengths working across a variety of areas. My strongest of these would be working with infrastructure in GCP and following this working as a Developer with Python as the core programming language. I have worked across these areas and technology stacks: DevOps - Google Cloud Platform, Terraform, Salt, gcloud, gsutil; SRE - Prometheus.io, Zabbix, PagerDuty; Developer - Python, Tox, Poetry, Django, Flask; Version Control - Git and GitHub; CI/CD - Jenkins; Across Roles - GKE (Google Kubernetes Engine), Docker
Financial Advisory Services - Synergy's Financial Advisory Services team assists Government entities meet their obligations under the Commonwealth Resource Management Framework.

entries.company: Australian Government Department of Human Services
entries.description: Part of a team that completes costings for the Department of Human Services. These costings are a significant factor in the level funding available to the department and often become aggregated into the Federal Budget.

entries.company: Australian Government Department of Human Services
entries.description: Complete estimate related processes as set out in Estimates Memorandums. Quality assure the financial statement components of the Portfolio Budget Statement and Portfolio Additional Estimates Statements.

entries.company: Australian Government Department of Human Services
entries.description: Monthly Reconciliations, various ledger integrity related tasks. Developed an automated and more accurate straight-line template for leases in accordance with AASB 117.

entries.company: Australian Government Department of Human Services
entries.description: Update Central Budget Management System (CBMS) through adjustments. Developed the reconciliation tool for the estimates baseline.

entries.company: Australian Government Department of Human Services
entries.description: Various roles including: Team Leader, Self Service Champion, ICT Helpdesk, Customer Service Advisor. Financial Information Service officer – development pool, Leadership development pool

Developing and using soft skills along with technical skills in my workplace is a high priority. Studying for the CPA designation keeps me focused on this and allows me to formally study the skills I utilize in the workplace.
Business Process Management (HD), Management Accounting (HD), Accounting Theory (HD), Financial Reporting (D)
University Games 2008 Team Captain & Manager, 3rd place under 81kg division Judo, 1st place male team judo
